Idan kuna son canza asusu, zaku iya amfani da [wannan hanyar ha…óin yanar gizon]({0}) sannan kawai shigar da lambar izini bayan danna ma…ìallin **{1} Tabbatarwa**.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.title: Yarjejeniyar mai amfani
ha.devauth.embed.legal.description: **Baku yarda da yarjejeniyar mai amfani akan bayanan martaba ba {0}**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement2: Amfani da wa…óannan fasalulluka na STW Daily (Na'ura Auth, Saituna, Profile, da sauransu) ana sarrafa su ta hanyar ∆ôarin saitin sharu…ó…óan masu zuwa:
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement4: Ta hanyar yin amfani da wa…óannan fasalulluka, a nan kuna nuna yarjejeniya ga tushen yarjejeniyar STW Daily, akwai a: {0}. Hakanan kun yarda da wa…óannan sharu…ó…óan da aka zayyana a cikin wannan yarjejeniya.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement6: Samun damar ku zuwa wa…óannan fasalulluka yana kasancewa azaman lasisi wanda za'a iya soke shi a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili. ∆òungiyar STW Daily Dev Team tana da ha∆ô∆ôin soke damar ku a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement8: Kai ne ke da alhakin duk asusu (s) da aka ha…óa zuwa wannan sabis …óin, da duk wani abu da zai iya faruwa gare su. Kai ne ke da alhakin yin aikinka don kiyaye amintattun asusunku, da aminci; KAR KA YI AMFANI DA ACCOUNT (S) WANDA BA KA SAMU HANYAR Imel (sai dai idan ba ka fahimci abin da kake yi ba), a matsayin 'password rest' ana iya kunnawa akan asusu da aka ha…óa.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement9: Kuna …óaukar duk wani alhaki a cikin amfani da STW Daily. ∆òungiyar Daily ta STW ∆ôila ba za a …óauki alhakin kowane sakamako mara kyau ba.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement11: ∆òungiyar Daily ta STW tana ∆ôo∆ôarin kiyaye asusunku a matsayin amintaccen mai yiwuwa, yayin da yake kasancewa mai gaskiya da bu…óe ido. Muna adana wasu ∆ôayyadaddun bayanai wa…óanda ke da ala∆ôa da asusun Discord …óin ku akan bayanan MongoDB Atlas wanda aka shirya a Amurka. STW Daily kanta ana gudanar da ita akan sabar AWS a Amurka. Ana adana bayanan asusun ku amintacce azaman rufaffen bayanan AES wanda kawai …ìangare na STW Daily Team ke samun dama ga.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement13: STW Daily za ta tattara da adana ta∆ôaitaccen bayanan da ke da ala∆ôa da asusun Discord …óin ku, don adana bayanan ingantattun asusun na dogon lokaci, da kuma samar muku da babban gogewa a yanzu, da kuma nan gaba. Kuna iya duba Manufar Sirrin mu anan: {0}
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description1: Duk lokacin da kuka yi ∆ôo∆ôarin tantancewa ba tare da zama mai aiki ba, za ku tantance ta atomatik tare da asusun da ke da ala∆ôa da wannan bayanin martaba.
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description2: Idan kana son cire wannan hanyar, danna maballin {0} **Cire hanyar ha…ói**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description3: Don sake tabbatarwa da wannan asusu, danna maballin {0} **Sake Tabbatarwa Yanzu**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description4.enab: Don kunna da'awar kai ga duk asusunku, danna ma…ìallin {0} ** Kunna da'awar atomatik ***
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description4.disa: Don kashe da'awar kai ga duk asusunku, danna ma…ìallin {0} **Kashe Da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.processed.success: *An yi nasarar kunna da'awar ta atomatik*

ha.devauth.slash.description: ∆òir∆ôirar zaman tantancewa wanda zai sa ku shiga na dogon lokaci
ha.devauth.meta.description1: Wannan umarnin yana ba ku damar adana zaman tantancewar ku don kiyaye ku cikin dogon lokaci. Da zarar kun saita wannan umarni, ba za ku ∆ôara bu∆ôatar samar da lambar auth …óin ku ba.
ha.devauth.meta.description2: Don Allah kar a yi amfani da wannan umarni sai dai idan kuna da damar shiga imel …óin asusun ku, saboda ana iya kunna sake saitin kalmar sirri.
ha.devauth.meta.description3: Bayan kun saita ingantaccen na'urar, zaku iya amfani da wannan umarni don shiga cikin lokacin gwaji ta atomatik. Wannan zai …óauki ladan ku na STW ta atomatik kowace rana. Kuna iya fita daga wannan a kowane lokaci.

ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Hamada mai ban sha'awa. Arziki yana da yawa a cikin wannan …ìangarorin …ìalle! Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_EasterEggDesert.name: An binne a cikin Taswirar Hamada
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar isa ga Planet's Core. An taba tunanin shigarta kogon al'ajabi ce. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_PlanetCore.name: Babban Taswirar Duniya'
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterForest.des: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga dajin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa. Wannan dazuzzukan da ke nutsewa na iya …óaukar asirai da abubuwan ban mamaki da yawa. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_Special_UnderwaterTunnel.des: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Ramin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa. Tatsuniyoyi sun ce an kafa wannan rami ta hanyar mage mai ∆ôarfi. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.desc: Makullin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga kwarin Waterfall. An san shi duka don kyawun kyawunsa, da wa…óanda suka …ìace don neman asirinta. Babu hukunce-hukuncen gazawa, ko juzu'i na kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.TM_WaterfallValley_Map7.name: Taswirar Taswirar Ruwa na Asirin
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.desc: Yana ba da babban, ha…ìaka na dindindin zuwa matsakaicin HP.
ha.wex.item.UpgradeHealthMajor.name: Babban Lafiya Elixir
